value.title: At VentureBeat’s AI Impact Tour, Microsoft explores the risks and rewards of gen AI
value.excerpt: Microsoft's Sara Bird spoke with VentureBeat about how organizations can balance the risks and rewards of AI applications.

value.title: Prompt Engineering Technique Known As The Step-Around Is Gaining Steam As Generative AI Becomes Less Forthright
value.excerpt: A prompt engineering technique known as the step-around is gaining attention due to generative AI increasingly being less forthright. Here's what you need to know.

value.title: Microsoft insiders worry the company has become just 'IT for OpenAI'
value.excerpt: Microsoft's AI strategy has increasingly focused on OpenAI. The shift has led to some executive departures and less focus on Microsoft's own services.

value.title: How to use Google Gemini, the main challenger to ChatGPT
value.excerpt: Gemini Advanced is Google’s paid chatbot version that costs $20 per month and comes with a host of perks under the Google One AI Premium subscription tier. Gemini Advanced runs the Gemini Ultra 1.0 language model, which excels at understanding longer prompts and the context of previous prompts.

value.title: Azure AI Health Bot helps create copilot experiences with healthcare safeguards

value.title: Box gets even smarter with Azure OpenAI Service integration
value.excerpt: Box AI, including the newly announced Azure OpenAI Service integration, is now included in Enterprise Plus plans. Individual users have access to 20 queries per month, with a further 2,000 queries available at the company level.

value.title: Anthropic & AWS-Google Set to Outpace Microsoft-OpenAI Duo

value.title: Google's AI-First Strategy Brings Vector Support To Cloud Databases
value.excerpt: Google’s move towards native support for vector storage in existing databases simplifies building enterprise GenAI applications relying on data stored in the cloud.
